about_the_game:
Roguelike x Relaxation!
Take it easy in the latest addition to the series where you buff your bust with every foe you defeat, Omega Labyrinth!

Now, in addition to adventuring through dungeons, you can enjoy the finer things in life. Taking care of flowers, rebuilding the academy, having a little fun on the side...

Enjoy your daily life in an academy of fair maidens!



●A bonafide roguelike RPG you can play again and again!

Venture through a dungeon with different rooms and items every time you challenge it. Power up your gear and make wise use of your skills to defeat your foes. There are even dungeons with 99 floors!

●Expand your bust with every fallen foe! Mightier mammaries lead to greater power!

Defeating foes builds up Omega Power in the chest, increasing bust size and parameters. They go all the way up to a Z cup!

●Raise flowers, rebuild the academy, and more! Enjoy a laid-back life!

Through planting seeds in the garden and raising flowers, or changing up the decor like the trees, lights or benches, you can change the scenery of the academy like never before in this new addition to the series!

*This game is adapted from the Nintendo Switch version of Omega Labyrinth Life. Animations, artwork, and game mechanics are the same as Omega Labyrinth Life on the Nintendo Switch.

highlighted.name: You've Got a Friend in Me

content_descriptors.notes:
Omega Labyrinth Life is a Rogue-like RPG where female characters brave dungeons.

This game contains partial nudity, sexual themes, harsh language, and content that may not be suitable for all ages. Although it does not contain any graphic sexual content, it does have a mode where characters can be touched and as such may not be appropriate for the workplace. 

*All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
Digital Deluxe Edition


The Omega Labyrinth Life Deluxe Edition is packed with a variety of DLC, including costumes to dress up characters on the home screen, items to change the Academy's BGM to character songs from the series, and more.

Deluxe Edition Set Includes
1. "Omega Labyrinth Life" Full Game
2. Pacifier Sword
3. Drool Shield
4. Queen's Whip
5. Bondage Shield
6. Costume: Hinata (Swimsuit)
7. Costume: Berune (Swimsuit)
8. Costume: Mei (Swimsuit)
9. Costume: Mio (Swimsuit)
10. Costume: Nanami (Swimsuit)
11. Costume: Juri (Swimsuit)
12. Costume: Yurika (Swimsuit)
13. Costume: Hinata (Animal)
14. Costume: Berune (Animal)
15. Costume: Mei (Animal)
16. Costume: Mio (Animal)
17. Costume: Nanami (Animal)
18. Costume: Juri (Animal)
19. Costume: Yurika (Animal)
20. Character Song: Hinata
21. Character Song: Berune
22. Character Song: Mei
23. Character Song: Mio
24. Character Song: Nanami
25. Character Song: Juri
26. Character Song: Yurika
27. Character Song: Nem
28. Character Song: Pai
29. Character Songs "Anberyl" Set of 15

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280/Radeon HD 7750
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750　1GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

8/10 – Cubed3
